about.description: Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

name: dagstermill
raw_meta_yaml:
# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prefix-dev/recipe-format/main/schema.json
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: 0.25.11
  python_min: ${{ python_min | default("3.9") }}
  version_major: '0.25'
  dagster: dagster ==1.9.${{ version | replace(version_major ~ ".", "") }}
  dagster_python: python >=3.9,<3.13
  dagster_ge_python: python >=3.10,<3.13
  # from python_modules/libraries/dagster-dbt/dagster_dbt/dbt_core_version.py
  dagster_dbt_core: dbt-core >=1.7,<1.10
  # utility
  pip_install: -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation --disable-pip-version-check

recipe:
  name: dagster-libs
  version: ${{ version }}

build:
  number: 0

outputs:
  # A
  - package:
      name: dagster-airbyte
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-airbyte/dagster-airbyte-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: f0310e98770cdabd6ba10dd14fe6dcc584024951703a7be049aaa3717d396f77
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-airbyte = dagster_airbyte.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_airbyte
      - script: dagster-airbyte --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-airbyte
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Airbyte with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-aws
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-aws/dagster-aws-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: ed69ee4a96d57e0a63b3f1f6d66261eaf67c16e52360f0b263bb8b5364ebf3ca
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - boto3
        - packaging
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_aws
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-aws
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for AWS-specific Dagster framework solid and resource components.
  # B
  # C
  - package:
      name: dagster-celery
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery/dagster-celery-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 04b7e770a26784e714055b7d4d51351b9a3f7940469daca241447c2aa4067aef
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-celery = dagster_celery.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - celery >=4.3.0
        - click >=5.0,<9
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_celery
      - script: dagster-celery --help

    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for using Celery as Dagster's execution engine.

  - package:
      name: dagster-celery-docker
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery-docker/dagster-celery-docker-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 17f5d2a14b1e5f8a617c4c0c126653d84d70e621f46dea5bb6fa12db11ae4ad3
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-celery", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - dagster-graphql
        - docker-py
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_celery
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery-docker
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for celery-docker

  - package:
      name: dagster-celery-k8s
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery-k8s/dagster-celery-k8s-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 396c10ff58b95bb0722f6dd08f604ccf6926674a397445c8c476e030ba75dfff
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-celery", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-k8s", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_celery_k8s
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery-k8s
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for celery-k8s-executor

  - package:
      name: dagster-census
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-census/dagster-census-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 90c6f7db0bd28740337a2ee5b993ba48e4abb9ccd35b8913a9f6cbc036df9629
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_census
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-census
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Census with Dagster.

  # D
  - package:
      name: dagster-dask
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dask/dagster-dask-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: d320a323a87df5591ffcdcf353118679eb0ecd92b76690bb849df57c800c6a63
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - bokeh
        - dask >=1.2.2
        - distributed >=1.28.1
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_dask
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-dask
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for using Dask as Dagster's execution engine.

  - package:
      name: dagster-datadog
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-datadog/dagster-datadog-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 066eb5a96cadf40b059919947804d4f07872e598fcab73ecbb8ab384e1c5e5e5
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - datadog
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_datadog
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-datadog
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for datadog Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-dbt
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dbt/dagster-dbt-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: d804a3a9e4e6108e765ad133eca1fa10a77473ce89b9f6c471c59843679384b0
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-dbt-cloud = dagster_dbt.cloud.cli:app
          - dagster-dbt = dagster_dbt.cli.app:app
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_dbt_core }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - jinja2
        - networkx
        - orjson
        - packaging
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
        - rich
        - sqlglot-rs
        - typer >=0.9.0
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_dbt
      - script:
          - dagster-dbt-cloud --help
          - dagster-dbt --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-dbt
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for dbt

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake/dagster-deltalake-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 17eaecd166be47f06e28fcdd5ef615ed50924744f8248b3df557da4f0ed3ae8e
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - deltalake >=0.15,<0.18
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_deltalake
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Deltalake-specific Dagster framework op and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake-pandas/dagster-deltalake-pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: d1211cecf55424794599d38287c88d08a8d3185e5a2a9913069d7e43ffc08c78
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-deltalake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_deltalake_pandas
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in Delta tables

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake-polars
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake-polars/dagster-deltalake-polars-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 0b245d33a90575d47eef7ad372cf5cae1449404208bae085329db1961a63f541
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-deltalake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - polars
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        # TODO: update after https://github.com/conda-forge/polars-feedstock/issues/194
        # for now https://github.com/pola-rs/polars/blob/main/py-polars/pyproject.toml#L52C13-L52C29
        - pyarrow >=7.0.0
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_deltalake_polars
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake-polars
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Polars DataFrames in Delta tables.

  - package:
      name: dagster-docker
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-docker/dagster-docker-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 695cfaffdf38c9b107103942037957072e691780776f8d41cbcac81468cc7e73
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - docker-image-py
        - docker-py
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_docker

    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-docker
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for docker


  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb/dagster-duckdb-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 2692de8093f932a98a36358ae3d8843141dc3b7ce8cedeb1b85e0165f5cc5bde
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - python-duckdb <0.10.0
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_duckdb
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for DuckDB-specific Dagster framework op and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-pandas/dagster-duckdb-pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: a39a082959b828133b22aa95746b3a9a5e61536f0fab8e2545e5774bd851161f
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_duckdb_pandas
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in DuckDB.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-polars
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-polars/dagster-duckdb-polars-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 25da195a984e020e8812903b4cd98e0a65d2a5c37a092bd9535b73cdb4cec917
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pyarrow >=4.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        # TODO: get polars-with-X outputs
        - polars
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_duckdb_polars
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-polars
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Polars DataFrames in DuckDB.
  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-pyspark/dagster-duckdb-pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 441bf670f24e3c565d6afac9e85eacfdb5c2be72c80a833125fd6dd81e5a1e71
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - pyarrow
        - pyspark >=3
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_duckdb_pyspark
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing PySpark DataFrames in DuckDB.

  # E
  # F
  - package:
      name: dagster-fivetran
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-fivetran/dagster-fivetran-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 899e89a3fd529a15d35cb4b712a5754e8aba7c3a57cceb250d607f0c64d58070
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-fivetran = dagster_fivetran.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_fivetran
      - script:
          - dagster-fivetran --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-fivetran
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Fivetran with Dagster.

  # G
  - package:
      name: dagster-gcp
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-gcp/dagster-gcp-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: c577d7a7ea7fb889abf9fb173ea04d6136af5c2b1430e790a8812303fd069440
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-pandas", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - db-dtypes
        - google-api-python-client
        - google-cloud-bigquery-core
        - google-cloud-storage
        - oauth2client
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_gcp
            - dagster_gcp.bigquery
            - dagster_gcp.dataproc
            - dagster_gcp.gcs
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-gcp
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for GCP-specific Dagster framework solid and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-gcp-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-gcp-pandas/dagster-gcp-pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 0c7f7db8c41f786a27f1588b2ea904da4c80b8678fafd260681319f274a0427d
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-gcp", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_gcp_pandas
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-gcp-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in GCP.

  - package:
      name: dagster-gcp-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-gcp-pyspark/dagster-gcp-pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 5c6c4353e2a6a787548e23d9d4bdfb1b7d41393a63f9c92ec2365ed3f70d2d5b
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-gcp", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pyspark
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_gcp_pyspark
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-gcp-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing PySpark DataFrames in GCP

  - package:
      name: dagster-ge
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-ge/dagster-ge-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 528eb7e8f9fd4d435e123f8b8ef4a985ce5b55b44b99e677e5e6b8dbb003cc20
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_ge_python }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - setuptools
        # must be 3.10
        # - python >=${{ python_min }}
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_ge_python }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-pandas", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - dataclasses
        - great-expectations >=0.17.15
        # must be 3.10
        # - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: '3.10'
          imports:

    about:

      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for GE-specific Dagster framework solid and resource components.

    tests:
      - python:
          # as of #60, see `dagster-mlflow X requires mlflow, which is not installed``

          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:

      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pyopenssl >=22.1.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - snowflake-connector-python >=3.4.0
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_snowflake
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Snowflake Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-spark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-spark/dagster-spark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 881b18d1844d171c6e39a50a4de1f4455f4d82d66f70ed00dd5b05be30b60291
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_spark
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-spark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Spark Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-snowflake-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-snowflake-pandas/dagster-snowflake-pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 1b13c49ef23cac2729e5fb98b6c20996a195db011940fc3a96274b7d14af21c3
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-snowflake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
        - snowflake-connector-python >=2.1.0
        - snowflake-sqlalchemy >=1.2
        - sqlalchemy !=1.4.42
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_snowflake_pandas
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Snowflake and Pandas with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-snowflake-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-snowflake-pyspark/dagster-snowflake-pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 8c33e4fb25b745e7ab0810e8fba132db048198f50a89f2524252b2e25f97bed9
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-snowflake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pyspark
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
        - snowflake-sqlalchemy
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_snowflake_pyspark
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Snowflake and PySpark with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-ssh
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-ssh/dagster-ssh-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 03ea8ca7c2007b77a13192d3f67fa64ff2c2656f88b96475c897262067cac643
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - paramiko
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - sshtunnel
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_ssh
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-ssh
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for ssh Dagster framework components.

  # T
  - package:
      name: dagster-tableau
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-tableau/dagster_tableau-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 7d4f9e26cb0de012ec7c252892bd7fb2b3ce5b6d7ac42fdb3388a8840c442ffd
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pyjwt
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - tableauserverclient >=0.32
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_tableau
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-tableau
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Build assets representing Tableau workbooks and sheets.

  - package:
      name: dagster-twilio
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-twilio/dagster-twilio-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 1a80b2707131b71026338c71e2acc4f9c83e62968895a43ccdc773a3d6c37806
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - twilio
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_twilio
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-twilio
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for twilio

  # U
  # V
  # W
  - package:
      name: dagster-wandb
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-wandb/dagster-wandb-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: e782a75a2e7366c686c6c7fbfb7c0155423943d37af71efff18017eae83fb121
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - wandb >=0.15.11,<1.0
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagster_wandb
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-wandb
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for wandb Dagster components.

  # X
  # Y
  # Z

  # not hyphenated

  - package:
      name: dagstermill
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagstermill/dagstermill-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 5e98be308e074ec1e78795228465eb34750eaeab0e36ac224422e29479d6b261
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagstermill = dagstermill.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ipykernel >=4.9.0,!=5.4.0,!=5.4.1
        - ipython_genutils >=0.2.0
        - jupyter_client <8
        - nbconvert
        - packaging >=20.9
        - papermill >=1.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - scrapbook >=0.5
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version: ${{ python_min }}
          imports:
            - dagstermill
      - script:
          - dagstermill --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagstermill
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for papermill


about:
  homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io
  summary: The data orchestration platform built for productivity.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  documentation: https://docs.dagster.io
  description: >-
    Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

extra:
  feedstock-name: dagster-libs
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
    - conda-forge/dagster
